title: Can't change PW
body: Can't change my password/email, for some odd reason. I typed it in correctly. Contacted Riot already, hopefully they'll fix it..

replies.body:
Since you've already submitted a support ticket, I recommend continuing to remain patient while one of our account specialists gets back to you. Please avoid replying to or "bumping" your ticket, as it sends your ticket to the back of the queue and only lengthens the time it takes for someone to get back to you. 

Let me know if you have any questions.
